description: Looking for Christmas dessert ideas? Try this indulgent black forrest trifle recipe layered with chocolate, cherry and creamy custard.
name: Black Forest Trifle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.17kg chocolate mud cakes, icing discarded, icing discarded, cakes cut into 4cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare jelly according to packet instructions. Pour into a 17cm round (19cm deep) flatbased bowl. Refrigerate for 4 hours or until set.
Place cherries, brandy (if using) and 1/4 cup sugar in a large bowl and stir gently to combine. Stand for 10 minutes to macerate.

Using an electric mixer, beat mascarpone, custard, half of the cream and remaining sugar in a second large bowl until justfirm peaks form. Spoon mixture over jelly, adding a little cherry syrup mixture.
Arrange cake on top of cream mixture. Spoon over a little more cherry syrup mixture.
Using an electric mixer, beat remaining cream in a medium bowl until justfirm peaks form. Dollop cream over cake, drizzle with remaining cherry syrup mixture, top with extra cherries and serve.
